name: Used Laptop Resele
techonology: React, React Router, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Tailwind CSS,Authentication, Vercel, React-photo-view, Stripe, Axios, React Query.

description.point: In this website, I created an admin role, seller role, and buyer role.
A seller can post a product and a buyer can buy a product.
Admin can see all buyers and products, and also can delete buyers or sellers..
On this website I also created an advertisement system, A seller can advertise his products.
And I also implement a payment method using stripe.

name: Tourist service

description.point: On this website, a user can give his review.
To create a review a user first signs in to this site.
Here a user sees their review and another user's review.
Users can update, create and delete their reviews.
Here a user can post a service but first sign in this website,
